verses.verse: שִׁמְע֞וּ <WH8085> Hear הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this word הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this פָּר֤וֹת <WH6510> ye kine הַבָּשָׁן֙ <WH1316> of Bashan אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> that [are] in the mountain שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria הָעֹשְׁק֣וֹת <WH6231> which oppress דַּלִּ֔ים <WH1800> the poor הָרֹצְצ֖וֹת <WH7533> which crush אֶבְיוֹנִ֑ים <WH34> the needy הָאֹמְרֹ֥ת <WH559> which say לַאֲדֹֽנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH113> to their masters הָבִ֥יאָה <WH935> Bring וְנִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> and let us drink

נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <WH7650> hath sworn אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> The Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3069> GOD בְּקָדְשׁ֔וֹ <WH6944> by his holiness כִּ֛י <WH3588> for הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> that lo the days בָּאִ֣ים <WH935> shall come עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> upon וְנִשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> upon you that he will take you away אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> בְּצִנּ֔וֹת <WH6793> with hooks וְאַחֲרִיתְכֶ֖ן <WH319> and your posterity בְּסִיר֥וֹת <WH5518> hooks דּוּגָֽה׃ <WH1729> fish

וּפְרָצִ֥ים <WH6556> at the breaches תֵּצֶ֖אנָה <WH3318> And ye shall go out אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> every נֶגְדָּ֑הּ <WH5048> straight וְהִשְׁלַכְתֶּ֥נָה <WH7993> [cow at that which is] before her and ye shall cast הַהַרְמ֖וֹנָה <WH2038> [them] into the palace נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

בֹּ֤אוּ <WH935> Come בֵֽית־ אֵל֙ <WH1008> to Bethel וּפִשְׁע֔וּ <WH6586> and transgress הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <WH1537> at Gilgal הַרְבּ֣וּ <WH7235> multiply לִפְשֹׁ֑עַ <WH6586> transgression וְהָבִ֤יאוּ <WH935> and bring לַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> every morning זִבְחֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2077> your sacrifices לִשְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> after three יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> years מַעְשְׂרֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH4643> [and] your tithes

וְקַטֵּ֤ר <WH6999> And offer מֵֽחָמֵץ֙ <WH2557> with leaven תּוֹדָ֔ה <WH8426> a sacrifice of thanksgiving וְקִרְא֥וּ <WH7121> and proclaim נְדָב֖וֹת <WH5071> the free offerings הַשְׁמִ֑יעוּ <WH8085> [and] publish כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֵ֤ן <WH3651> for this אֲהַבְתֶּם֙ <WH157> liketh בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> you O ye children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> GOD

וְגַם־ <WH1571> also אֲנִי֩ <WH589> I נָתַ֨תִּי <WH5414> And I also have given לָכֶ֜ם נִקְי֤וֹן <WH5356> you cleanness שִׁנַּ֙יִם֙ <WH8127> of teeth בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עָ֣רֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5892> in all your cities וְחֹ֣סֶר <WH2640> and want לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> of bread בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מְקוֹמֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4725> in all your places וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH7725> yet have ye not returned עָדַ֖י <WH5704> to Me נְאֻם־ <WH5002> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> Furthermore אָנֹכִי֩ <WH595> I מָנַ֨עְתִּי <WH4513> And also I have withholden מִכֶּ֜ם <WH4480> at אֶת־ <WH853> הַגֶּ֗שֶׁם <WH1653> the rain בְּע֨וֹד <WH5750> still שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> from you when [there were] yet three חֳדָשִׁים֙ <WH2320> months לַקָּצִ֔יר <WH7105> to the harvest וְהִמְטַרְתִּי֙ <WH4305> and I caused it to rain עַל־ <WH5921> and עִ֣יר <WH5892> city אֶחָ֔ת <WH259> upon one וְעַל־ <WH5921> and עִ֥יר <WH5892> city אַחַ֖ת <WH259> upon another לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אַמְטִ֑יר <WH4305> and caused it not to rain חֶלְקָ֤ה <WH2513> piece אַחַת֙ <WH259> one תִּמָּטֵ֔ר <WH4305> was rained וְחֶלְקָ֛ה <WH2513> upon and the piece אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תַמְטִ֥יר <WH4305> whereupon it rained עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> on תִּיבָֽשׁ׃ <WH3001> not withered

וְנָע֡וּ <WH5128> wandered שְׁתַּיִם֩ <WH8147> So two שָׁלֹ֨שׁ <WH7969> [or] three עָרִ֜ים <WH5892> cities אֶל־ <WH413> about עִ֥יר <WH5892> city אַחַ֛ת <WH259> unto one לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <WH8354> to drink מַ֖יִם <WH4325> water וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִשְׂבָּ֑עוּ <WH7646> but they were not satisfied וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH7725> yet have ye not returned עָדַ֖י <WH5704> to Me נְאֻם־ <WH5002> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

הִכֵּ֣יתִי <WH5221> I have smitten אֶתְכֶם֮ <WH853> בַּשִּׁדָּפ֣וֹן <WH7711> you with blasting וּבַיֵּרָקוֹן֒ <WH3420> and mildew הַרְבּ֨וֹת <WH7235> increased גַּנּוֹתֵיכֶ֧ם <WH1593> when your gardens וְכַרְמֵיכֶ֛ם <WH3754> and your vineyards וּתְאֵנֵיכֶ֥ם <WH8384> and your fig trees וְזֵיתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH2132> and your olive trees יֹאכַ֣ל <WH398> devoured הַגָּזָ֑ם <WH1501> the palmerworm וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH7725> [them] yet have ye not returned עָדַ֖י <WH5704> to Me נְאֻם־ <WH5002> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

שִׁלַּ֨חְתִּי <WH7971> I have sent בָכֶ֥ם דֶּ֙בֶר֙ <WH1698> among you the pestilence בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> after the manner מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt הָרַ֤גְתִּי <WH2026> have I slain בַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> with the sword בַּח֣וּרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH970> your young men עִ֖ם <WH5973> along שְׁבִ֣י <WH7628> and have taken away סֽוּסֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5483> your horses וָאַעֲלֶ֞ה <WH5927> to come up בְּאֹ֤שׁ <WH889> and I have made the stink מַחֲנֵיכֶם֙ <WH4264> of your camps וּֽבְאַפְּכֶ֔ם <WH639> unto your nostrils וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH7725> yet have ye not returned עָדַ֖י <WH5704> to Me נְאֻם־ <WH5002> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

הָפַ֣כְתִּי <WH2015> I have overthrown בָכֶ֗ם כְּמַהְפֵּכַ֤ת <WH4114> overthrew אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> [some] of you as God אֶת־ <WH853> סְדֹ֣ם <WH5467> Sodom וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲמֹרָ֔ה <WH6017> and Gomorrah וַתִּהְי֕וּ <WH1961> were like כְּא֖וּד <WH181> and ye were as a firebrand מֻצָּ֣ל <WH5337> plucked out מִשְּׂרֵפָ֑ה <WH8316> of the burning וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH7725> yet have ye not returned עָדַ֖י <WH5704> to Me נְאֻם־ <WH5002> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

לָכֵ֕ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> Therefore thus will I do לְּךָ֖ יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> unto thee O Israel עֵ֚קֶב <WH6118> [and] because כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for זֹ֣את <WH2063> I אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> I will do לָּ֔ךְ הִכּ֥וֹן <WH3559> this unto thee prepare לִקְרַאת־ <WH7125> to meet אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> O Israel

כִּ֡י <WH3588> For הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> behold יוֹצֵ֨ר <WH3335> For lo he that formeth הָרִ֜ים <WH2022> the mountains וּבֹרֵ֣א <WH1254> and createth ר֗וּחַ <WH7307> the wind וּמַגִּ֤יד <WH5046> and declareth לְאָדָם֙ <WH120> unto man מַה־ <WH4100> what שֵּׂח֔וֹ <WH7808> what [is] his thought עֹשֵׂ֥ה <WH6213> that maketh שַׁ֙חַר֙ <WH7837> the morning עֵיפָ֔ה <WH5890> darkness וְדֹרֵ֖ךְ <WH1869> and treadeth עַל־ <WH5921> on בָּ֣מֳתֵי <WH1116> upon the high places אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> The God צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name ס
